A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: wow.  this movie is really bad.  Did the critics even watch the movie or did the embargo terms include favourable views a must?   Did they show them a different cut of the film?  I cannot believe disney green lit this.  This movie felt like board members directed the film.  This isn't about the fan expectation and all that.  I'm just a casual star wars fan who have an interest only in the movies (I dont know anything about the novels and stuff).  As a movie this really sucked from a story telling point of view.  It was filled with\, well\, fillers and pointless public service announcements (casino scene?) that detracted from the main plot - if you even call it a main plot.  No spoilers\, but 3/4 of the movie can be deleted and still won't make a difference. The worst is when the people defend it saying that the bad parts were \"plot twists\" or it's \"new direction\" - to the dumpster right?   \ngod the dialogues were jarring to say the least.    Disney gave star wars team practically a blank cheque and this is what they came up with?  This pile of steam will not age well.     for that\, 1/2 star.
